00118 /*
00119 ** Macro Definitions
00120 */
00121 #define CFE_ES_DBIT(x) (1L << (x))                                    /* Places a one at bit positions 0 thru 31 */
00122 #define CFE_ES_DTEST(i,x) (((i) & CFE_ES_DBIT(x)) != 0)               /* TRUE iff bit x of i is set */
00123 #define CFE_ES_TEST_LONG_MASK(m,s)  (CFE_ES_DTEST(m[(s)/32],(s)%32))  /* Test a bit within an array of 32-bit integers. */
00124 #define CFE_ES_MAX_MEMPOOL_BLOCK_SIZES     17    
00126 /*
00127 **  Reset types
00128 */
00129 
00131 #define CFE_ES_PROCESSOR_RESET   1       
00132 #define CFE_ES_POWERON_RESET     2       
00134 #define CFE_ES_APP_RESTART       3       
00138 /*
00139 ** Reset Sub-Types
00140 */
00141 
00143 #define CFE_ES_POWER_CYCLE           1   
00144 #define CFE_ES_PUSH_BUTTON           2   
00145 #define CFE_ES_HW_SPECIAL_COMMAND    3   
00146 #define CFE_ES_HW_WATCHDOG           4   
00147 #define CFE_ES_RESET_COMMAND         5   
00148 #define CFE_ES_EXCEPTION             6   
00149 #define CFE_ES_UNDEFINED_RESET       7   
00150 #define CFE_ES_HWDEBUG_RESET         8   
00151 #define CFE_ES_BANKSWITCH_RESET      9   
00159 #define CFE_ES_CDS_MAX_FULL_NAME_LEN (CFE_ES_CDS_MAX_NAME_LENGTH + OS_MAX_API_NAME + 2)
00160 
00161 #define CFE_ES_CDS_BAD_HANDLE  (CFE_ES_CDSHandle_t) 0xFFFF
00162 
00164 /*
00165 ** ES Run Status and Exit Status defines
00166 */
00169 #define CFE_ES_APP_RUN                  1   
00170 #define CFE_ES_APP_EXIT                 2  
00171 #define CFE_ES_APP_ERROR                3  
00172 #define CFE_ES_SYS_EXCEPTION            4  
00173 #define CFE_ES_SYS_RESTART              5  
00174 #define CFE_ES_SYS_RELOAD               6  
00175 #define CFE_ES_SYS_DELETE               7  
00176 #define CFE_ES_CORE_APP_INIT_ERROR      8 
00177 #define CFE_ES_CORE_APP_RUNTIME_ERROR   9 
00180 #define CFE_ES_APP_KILL_TIMEOUT         5 
00182 /*
00183 ** System Log Defines
00184 */
00185 /* "+1" is for the space between the timestamp and the message in the system log */
00186 #define CFE_ES_MAX_SYSLOG_MSG_SIZE (CFE_EVS_MAX_MESSAGE_LENGTH + CFE_TIME_PRINTED_STRING_SIZE + 1)

00194 /*
00195 ** Memory Handle type
00196 */
00197 typedef uint32 CFE_ES_MemHandle_t;  
00199 /*
00200 ** Device driver type
00201 */
00202 typedef struct
00203 {
00204    uint32   InterruptId;            
00205    void    *IntInitFuncPtr;         
00206    void    *IntHWHandshakeFuncPtr;  
00207    void    *IntIsrFuncPtr;          
00209 } CFE_ES_DeviceDriver_t;
00210 
00211 
00212 /*
00213 ** 
00214 ** CFE_ES_AppInfo_t is a structure that is used to provide
00215 ** information about an app. It is primarily used for the QueryOne and
00216 ** QueryAll Commands.
00217 **
00218 */
00219 typedef struct
00220 {
00221    uint32   AppId;                          
00223    uint32   Type;                           
00226    uint8    Name[OS_MAX_API_NAME];          
00228    uint8    EntryPoint[OS_MAX_API_NAME];    
00230    uint8    FileName[OS_MAX_PATH_LEN];      
00233    uint32   StackSize;                      
00235    uint32   ModuleId;                       
00237    uint32   AddressesAreValid;              
00239    uint32   CodeAddress;                    
00241    uint32   CodeSize;                       
00243    uint32   DataAddress;                    
00245    uint32   DataSize;                       
00247    uint32   BSSAddress;                     
00249    uint32   BSSSize;                        
00251    uint32   StartAddress;                   
00253    uint16   ExceptionAction;                
00256    uint16   Priority;                       
00258    uint32   MainTaskId;                     
00260    uint32   ExecutionCounter;               
00262    uint8    MainTaskName[OS_MAX_API_NAME];  
00264    uint32   NumOfChildTasks;                
00268 } CFE_ES_AppInfo_t;
00269 
00270 /*
00271 ** Task Info Type
00272 */
00273 typedef struct
00274 {
00275    uint32   TaskId;                    
00276    uint32   ExecutionCounter;          
00277    uint8    TaskName[OS_MAX_API_NAME]; 
00278    uint32   AppId;                     
00279    uint8    AppName[OS_MAX_API_NAME];  
00281 } CFE_ES_TaskInfo_t;
00282 
00283 /*
00284 ** Memory Pool Statistics data type
00285 */
00286 typedef struct
00287 {
00288     uint32  BlockSize;               
00289     uint32  NumCreated;              
00290     uint32  NumFree;                 
00291 } CFE_ES_BlockStats_t;
00292 
00293 typedef struct
00294 {
00295     uint32                PoolSize;                
00297     uint32                NumBlocksRequested;      
00299     uint32                CheckErrCtr;             
00301     uint32                NumFreeBytes;            
00303     CFE_ES_BlockStats_t   BlockStats[CFE_ES_MAX_MEMPOOL_BLOCK_SIZES]; 
00305 } CFE_ES_MemPoolStats_t;
00306 
00307 typedef struct
00308 {
00309     uint32                Handle;          
00310     uint32                Size;            
00311     boolean               Table;           
00312     char                  Name[CFE_ES_CDS_MAX_FULL_NAME_LEN]; 
00313     uint8                 ByteAlignSpare1; 
00314 } CFE_ES_CDSRegDumpRec_t;
